za.co.solms.example.library
Interface Library

public interface Library

Contract for a simple services facade that specifies the services of a Library, which revolves around managing books and categories. NOTE: Supports only the use-cases specified bya simple exercise - is not fully featured.

Method Summary

          Adds the given book to the library

addNewBook

int addNewBook(Book book)
               throws InvalidBookException,
                      NoSuchCategoryException
Adds the given book to the library

Returns:
The system-generated id for the book
Throws:
InvalidBookException - If the book has invalid
NoSuchCategoryException - If the book references an unknown category fields, e.g. no name, author or catgeory.

                           DuplicateCategoryException
Adds the given category to the library.

Throws:
InvalidCategoryException - If the category does not have a name and a description.
DuplicateCategoryException - If the category already exists by name.
